product_description: The Concierge Ambassador Program provides hands-on in-person marketing within Chicago’s hotel network. A dedicated Ateema representative visits 25 to 100 downtown hotel properties on behalf of your business to educate concierges and guest service teams, distribute brochures or gifts, and strengthen your presence in the hospitality community. This personal outreach builds valuable relationships that drive visitor referrals and brand recognition directly at the point of guest decision. It’s ideal for local businesses seeking deeper connections with hotel influencers and concierge staff.
